author: ebrondol
body:
In order to have tracking reconstruction working again with the new DetId scheme, the first solution is using the concept of detBrothers in the TkDetLayers builders for Phase2OT.
This is supposed to be not the definitive solution - the definitive one would include the possibility of not to use the DetBrothers and instead using the StackGeomDet directly in the MeasurementTracker class.
The rest of the changes in this PR are concerning the DPG tools used in order to study the efficiency of the tracking local reconstruction. It has been introduced the possibility to check if the selection done on DetId bits and the one done using the TkTopology are the same. 

This PR is an update of PR#12771 with the new WFs running.
@boudoul @delaere @venturia
title: Fixing tracking in SLHCDEV release
